sent: Jos puhut minulle vielä kerran, leikkaan kurkkusi auki.

reference: He needs more than a deadbeat mother.

reference: - Leave it open.

reference: –Open your jacket!

reference: My boss comes out of the bathroom with his robe open,

sent: Kun saavuin, hän seisoi käytävällä aamutakki auki ja näytti villiltä.
reference: I got there, Yvette, I walked in, she was standing in the hallway looking wild, robe open, no gown, breasts hanging, just looking wild.
translation: When I got there, he was standing in the hallway, Wearing a robe, looking wild.

sent: Hänellä on ollut kylpytakki auki 30 vuotta, mutta nyt hän ei ole säädyllinen.
reference: The woman hasn't tied her robe in 20 years. Suddenly she's not decent?
translation: He's had his robe open for 30 years, but now he's not decent.

sent: - Olen ajanut väärään suuntaan jossain vaiheessa, - enkä löydä huoltoasemaa, joka olisi auki.
reference: Can i help you? I have taken a wrong turn somewhere and can't find a gas station that is open.
translation: I've been driving the wrong way at some point, and I can't find a gas station that's open.

sent: "Jotka ovat auki kellon ympäri auttamassa siirtymä vaiheessa"
reference: "Wich will be opened around the clock to aid in the transition"
translation: "Which is open 24 hours a day to help with the transition."

reference: We'd need a phaser to blast it open.

sent: Yksi kakkosvaiheen osallistujista jättäytyi pois, joten paikka on auki.
reference: We're in a very limited Phase 2 efficacy trial, but one of the participants has dropped out, ****
translation: One of the phase two attendees just dropped out, so the position's open.

sent: En ehkä tänään tai huomenna, mutta jossain vaiheessa revin kurkkusi auki, ja sitten sinä kuolet.
reference: Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but at some point I'm gonna rip open up your throat, and you're gonna die.

reference: Plenty of air in that old mine. Comes in from them ventilating shafts.

reference: That we throw it out of an air lock?

reference: Go, roll the dice and play.

reference: He threw away my girl scout cookies.

sent: Heitit vaasin päähäni kolme vuotta sitten ja minä jäin. Sinä väistit.
reference: You threw a vase at me 3 years ago and did not go away.
translation: You threw a vase at my head three years ago, and I stayed.

reference: Threw it away.
translation: - I threw it away.

reference: Watch the detonator.
translation: - Watch out for the trigger.

sent: Mutta tämä kama heittää käsityskyvyn ovet niin auki, että voi nähdä kokonaan uuden maailman.
reference: But this stuff, it, like, swings the doors of perception so wide open,... ..you can see a whole nother world out there. But it's still like this world, you know.
translation: But this stuff throws the doors of perception open so you can see a whole new world.

sent: Jätin auton ovet auki - hän heitti roskat kyytiin, ja häivyimme paikalta.
reference: I was to have the doors open so she could throw the garbage in, and then we took off.
translation: I left the car doors open, he threw the garbage out, and we got the hell out of there.

sent: Toimistoni on auki, jos haluatte heittää kamat pöydälleni.
reference: So, anyways, my office is unlocked if you guys just wanna, like, toss that on my desk or whatever.
translation: My office is open if you want to throw the stuff on my desk.

sent: Sinne voi ajaa, potkaista portin auki ja heittää, mitä tahtoo.
reference: Anyone can drive in there ...kick open a gate and dump whatever the hell they want.
translation: You can drive there, kick the gate open and throw whatever you want.

sent: Kukaan ei voisi pitää ovea auki tarpeeksi pitkään heittääkseen ruumiin.
reference: There's no way that I could keep that open long enough to dump a body.

sent: Yksi naisista heitti minulle vaiheisen, ja ammuin.
reference: One of the women threw me a phaser and I fired.

sent: Heitin ne vain roskikseen jossain vaiheessa, mikä tallentui turvakameraan.
reference: I just tossed them in a dumpster eventually. Which got caught on a grainy security camera.
translation: I just threw them in the garbage at some point, which was recorded on the security camera.

reference: And then at that point we've got some photos that we're gonna throw up on the big screen.
translation: That's where you throw photographs on the big screen.

sent: Heität pyyhkeen kehään jo tässä vaiheessa.
reference: So you've already thrown in the towel?

sent: Vaihe yksi on kuin heittäisi siiman veteen.
reference: Stage One is like throwing a fishing line out
translation: Step one is like throwing the line in the water.

reference: Our horses ran away.
translation: Our horses escaped.

sent: Ei se hevonen karkaa ennen kisan alkua.
reference: The horse isn't going anywhere until the race starts.

reference: Sir, I lost my job today. My horse ran away.
translation: I lost my job today, my horse ran away...

reference: I opened up the stable. The horse ran away.

reference: The horses are fleeing!

reference: And the kid was climbing the walls.
translation: And the kid freaked out.

reference: Just don't start climbing the walls.
translation: Don't start jumping on the walls.

reference: Probably climbing the walls right now.
translation: Probably jumping off the walls right now.

sent: Hän hyppii seinille Myöhemmin, kun olette kahden, hän käskee sinun pysyä minusta erossa.
reference: He'll be climbing the walls. Later, when you're alone, he'll order you to stay away from me.
translation: Later, when you're alone with him, he'll tell you to stay away from me.

sent: Meidän molempien ei ole järkeä jäätyä kuoliaaksi.
reference: There's no reason for both of us to freeze to death in here.
translation: There's no point in both of us freezing to death.

reference: - I hear water flowing under these stones.
translation: I can hear the water coursing under the rocks.

reference: Where have you been living? Under a rock?

reference: The sinkhole is in there, under that rock.
translation: The hole is under that rock.

reference: what, do you live underground?
translation: You live under a rock?

sent: Ennemmin tai myöhemmin kyllästyt - kiven alla elämiseen, ja egosi janoaa loistokasta paluuta elävienkirjoihin.
reference: Sooner or later, you will get tired of whatever rock you're living under and your ego won't be able to resist the urge to announce your glorious return to the living.
translation: Sooner or later, you're gonna get tired of living under a rock, and your ego's gonna thirst for a glorious return to the land of the living.

sent: -Ei. Jossain on koira haudattuna, mutta sitä ei näe - kaikelta hiekalta.
reference: There's a dog buried somewhere, but you can't see him because there's sand everywhere.
translation: There's a dog buried somewhere, but you can't see it.

sent: Jos käsi murtuu, tai jalka, kalsium korjaa luut ennalleen.
reference: You break a hand, you break a leg after a while, calcium joins it back together.
translation: If a hand breaks or a leg breaks, Islam's gonna fix the bones.

sent: Uhrin oikeassa nilkassa on pystysuora tappi - joka on kiinnitetty kirurgisesti korjaamaan luunmurtumaa.
reference: The victim's right ankle has a vertical transarticular pin that was surgically implanted to fix a past fracture.
translation: In the victim's right ankle? There's a vertical pin that's been surgically fastened to repair the fracture.

reference: I can mend bones in a heartbeat, but growing them back....
translation: I'll fix the bones, but redesigning them...

sent: Ja kuin menneen talven lumet, poissa.
reference: And like the snows of yesteryear, gone from this earth.

reference: All right, I'll go cookie-less.
translation: All right, I'll go clean.

sent: Jonkun on pakko leikata vanhat oksat pois.

sent: - Jos se on lammas, mä en pane sitä.

sent: Koska hänen sormissaan on kovettumia, - ja hänen mekkonsa tuoksuu hienoisesti pihkalle.

reference: It's, derived from the gum of boswellia trees, native to India.

reference: -He looks like his mother.
